about_the_game:
Taming Yore Dragon is an puzzle adventure game designed to teach player about mental health and anxiety through interesting gameplay.

Explore the world and solve puzzles as your bring light and colour back to an abandoned world.

Rescue and join forces with a diverse cast of characters who provide valuable insights and help with your journey along the way.

Features:

  • Diverse character customization allows you to put yourself as the main character of the story

  • Uncover an original fantasy story as you rescue the inhabitants of the Land of Yore

  • A balance of platforming challenges and puzzle solving as you make your way through the world

  • See a noticeable impact as you bring colour back to the lands by solving puzzles and helping the cast of characters overcome their problems

  • Learn about real life Cognitive Behavioral Therapy strategies as you progress through the game

  • A variety of accessibility options allowing players of all skill and experience to enjoy the story

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any 64Bit based Distro
  • Processor: Quad core or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any 64Bit based Distro
  • Processor: Quad core or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidea GeFore GTX 900 Series or Equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Taming Yore Dragon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10 or Higher
  • Processor: Quad core or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window 10 or Higher
  • Processor: Quad core or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidea GeFore GTX 900 Series
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Embark on an epic fantasy quest to restore colour and life to an abandoned world. Learn about real life strategies for managing anxiety taught in a fun and engaging way.
